com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.servlets

Class AbstractSessionServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenericServlet
      • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
        • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingAllMethodsServlet
          • com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.servlets.AbstractSessionServlet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilelibraryDownloadGetServlet
    Deprecated. 
    We now recommend directly extending SlingAllMethodsServlet and using the Sling ResourceResolverFactory and SlingHttpServletRequest APIs to acquire any necessary ResourceResolvers for interaction with the JCR repository and SocialResourceProviders.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractSessionServlet
extends SlingAllMethodsServlet
    The AbstractSessionServlet provides the basic facilities for getting or creating session based on a request. Implementations may vary on the properties persisted and request handling.
    Since:
    CQ 5.6.0
